entry.title: Heavy Rain Warning - Orange
entry.summary: Expect a further 50 to 80 mm of rain on top of what has already fallen. Peak rates of 10 to 15 mm/h. Thunderstorms possible, which could see rainfall rates up to 25 mm/h. Impact: Streams and rivers may rise rapidly. Surface flooding, slips, and difficult driving conditions possible. Chance of upgrading to a Red Warning: Minimal. Changes: Warning period extended to 4pm today.

entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: Periods of heavy rain, and amounts may approach warning criteria, or possibly exceed them in localised areas. Thunderstorms possible until tomorrow morning, with rainfall rates up to 25 mm/h. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.
